#summary Auto post messages in Alliance chat or Global Chat.  Most people use this for recruiting, or to annoy people.

Click BOT
Click Spam
At the bottom in the typing field, type your message.  
Set the time limit you want the message to occur.
It will send to Alliance by Default, click to send to Global.  
Click “Spam Off” To “Spam On” to begin your spamming.
